trans-unit.source: Represents an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
A RepeaterItem object represents an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control, such as the heading section, footer section, or a data item.

The data items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItemCollection> object that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
You can use a RepeaterItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> class.
The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a data item associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.

Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Gets the index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.

Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index number of the item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items%2A> collection of the control.
> [!NOTE] > This property only applies to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
The index of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.Items*> collection of the control.
Gets the type of the item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control.
Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.
The following table lists the different item types.

|Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |Header|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Footer|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Item|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |AlternatingItem|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |SelectedItem|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |EditItem|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Separator|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.| |Pager|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> control.|
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.

Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater"></xref> control, if the <xref:System.EventArgs> parameter is an instance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs"></xref>.
The source of the event.
An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event assigned to the parent was raised, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex*>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterItem.ItemIndex*> property.
